message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. This item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be equally beneficial to you, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you. Considering its significance and the effort put into its creation, I am proposing to sell it to you for $1,250,000. I believe this offer presents a fair compromise, allowing both parties to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
